desc: Kids play classes for ages 0-5 years old in the tri-state area featuring open-ended play classes by Jennie Monness, movement and dance classes by Dionne Kamara, Ramblin' Dan music classes, Puppetsburg classes and yoga for kids, expecting moms, and postpartum moms. A play space with theme based kids classes; babies too.

layout.text: USP Summer Series Open for Booking!

We are so excited to officially open booking for the Union Square Play Summer Series in partnership with ByHeart! You can now book classes for the full summer at our Bridgehampton, East Hampton, Westport, and Hudson Yards pop-ups, along with our brick-and-mortar NYC locations. We can't wait to play all summer long!
